metadata.title: CVE-2022-48706 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vdpa: ifcvf: Do proper cleanup if IFCVF init failsifcvf_mgmt_dev leaks memory if it is not freed beforereturning. Call is made to correct return statementso memory does not leak. ifcvf_init_hw does not takecare of this so it is needed to do it here.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
